channel.title: introspections on Bits of Insight
channel.description: Recent content in introspections on Bits of Insight

item.title: On Being Slow
item.description: A colleague told me about two types of processors Internal Processor: A person who gives one clear statement – externally; formulates what to say, makes corrections to it, etc. – internally External Processor: A person who says something without thinking then corrects it and then some more correction… I’ve mostly been an external processor. I’m clumsy and impatient. I’m impulsive and judgemental too. I’m intuition-driven; deliberate, thought-through actions are a rarity.
